en: So you saved the world, did you?

en: \f[7]\nb[\n[7]]Perhaps we will tell you the full story of the Conyan and Micyan, someday.
it: \f[7]\nb[\n[7]]Magari un giorno ti racconteremo meglio la storia dei Conyan e dei Mycian…
